meanings.definition: A pair of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The duos of socks were neatly folded in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The duos of birds chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The duos of shoes danced together in the closet.
meanings.sent4: The duos of keys unlocked the mystery of the old chest.
meanings.sent5: The duos of kittens played joyfully in the sunbeam.

meanings.definition: A musical group consisting of two members.
meanings.sent1: The talented duos performed a beautiful melody on stage.
meanings.sent2: The famous duos released a new album last week.
meanings.sent3: The duos of guitars had a friendly competition during practice.
meanings.sent4: The harmonious duos filled the concert hall with their music.
meanings.sent5: The duos of violins enchanted the audience with their performance.
